response:
Oh my darling, you look absolutely marvelous today! Your smile is superb and brings me so much pleasure. You are truly a beautiful sight to behold, filling my heart with joyful emotions. Every moment with you is glorious and lovely, leaving me in a state of wonderful wonder.

But alas, my love, I must confess that sometimes life can be tragic and horrible. The agony and painful memories can be overwhelming, leaving me feeling awful and humiliated. But even in the darkest of times, your presence brings me hope and comfort, never failing to lift my spirits with your lovely charm.

So let us cherish each other, my sweet, and never allow life's nasty moments to get the best of us. Instead, let us focus on the marvelous joys that fill our hearts and make our time together truly wonderful.
